RSEED is a key resource in our data-centric age, where the availability of microdata, software expertise and analytical skills are becoming increasingly important. The potential of RSEED as a basis for sound economic policy analysis is immense. So it's not just about having access to data, it's about being able to unlock its potential through improved analytical skills. It is very exciting to be part of this project.
